title: Can a Team of Writers Use the Parabolic Mode as Key to Developing a Detective Series?
description:
Matt and I brainstorm how to develop the characters and the narrative arc that would carry a detective series to 100 episodes. In the last 20 minutes or so, we get around to discussing Jordan Peterson's latest conversation with Jonathan Pageau. We invite your comments!

Notable quotes from Matt:
The parabolic modality is a tool for evoking from people a body of knowledge that has to be articulated.
Suffering is the accent of every moment in language that hits us. You'll eventually see a face.
Cliches are shouted. Gold is whispered.
Bring the unknown into the center of the known.
The fulcrum can be a controlling idea. If you have two ideas, you swing from good to bad to good. But if you have three things, then you have eternity to work with.

Follow Karen on Twitter @klwong43
https://karenwongart.com
https://TheMeaningCode.com
